question:
Which of the following statements conform to the findings of the Public Enterprises Survey -2018-19 published by the Department of Public Enterprises (DPE) recently?
  1. Both ONGC and NTPC are among India's top profit making PSUs
  2. Both BSNL and MTNL are among India's top loss making PSUs
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation:
The Public Enterprises Survey is published by the Department of Public Enterprises (DPE) under the Union Ministry of Heavy Industries and Public Enterprises. This is an annual survey that records the performance of public sector units. The recent survey studied 348 central public sector enterprises (CPSEs).
The 2018-19 survey reported that the CPSEs showed an increase in overall profit from the 2017-18 period by 15.52%. While the profits in 2017-18 period was 1,23,751 crore INR, the 2018-19 period recorded a profit of 1,42,951 INR. In this period 249 CPSEs were operational.
ONGC was one of the top most profitable CPSEs in this period. Indian Oil Corporation and NTPC are the other top profiting CPSEs. The highest losses in this period were incurred by BSNL, Air India and MTNL. 13 CPSEs were under closure or liquidation in this period.
